posts.post_content:
Very large tobacco card... Actually it's a 30" x 46" Metal sign. T206 related.
Will sell for $210 or trade for 1910 era Pittsburg cards/PC's.( or any graded T206 or E cards of comp. value)

[img]http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3362/3598548444_d359a03bc0_b.jpg[/img]
Bump to reflect lower price. Willing to trade for T or E cards. Looking to move this sign for a reasonable price/trade. Need the space.
